mean_cn: n. 系统; 体制; 身体;

mean_cn: n.工作；作品vi.起作用，有效果，奏效

mean_cn: n. 木屑, 碎片;  缺口;  圆形筹码;  芯片;  vi. 碎裂;  vt. 削, 凿;  将…削成、凿成;

sentence: The children skip across the chalk boxes.

mean_cn: 强身健体；使有条理，恰当安排

mean_cn: phr. 计算出; 锻炼; 计划; 解决;

sentence: They are mostly very holy.

mean_cn: adj.商业区的，闹市区的 adv.往(在)商业区

sentence: Graduating from university in such a short time is a major achievement.

sentence: This is such a peaceful spot.

sentence: Go on a diet of fresh fruit to stay slim and healthy.

sentence: I'm so ashamed; don't even look at me!

mean_cn: n. 午夜, 半夜;  adj. 半夜的;

sentence_tra: 我不知道这通电话说了些什么，但我能看出她脸上悲伤的神情。

mean_cn: adv. 适当地; 正确地; 恰当地;

sentence_tra: 如果你要去一场高贵晚宴，你应该穿着得当。不允许穿T恤！

sentence: First bend to the right, then bend to the left.
sentence_tra: 先向右弯曲，再向左弯曲。

mean_cn: adj. 勤勉的, 勤奋努力的;

sentence_tra: 这个辛苦的渔民每周工作7天，每天工作16个小时。

mean_cn: adv.不论用何种方法，无论如何；随意地；尽管如此

sentence: Make sure to take out the garbage.

sentence: I have a huge collection of DVD.

mean_cn: n. 紧急情况，突发事件

mean_cn: 单词原型：look back on  回顾； 回忆起
sentence: Old family photos allow us to look back on our family history.
sentence_tra: 老的家庭照片使得我们能回顾家族历史。

sentence: The worker is in charge of all the equipment at the building project.

sentence: Western literature comes in many different languages.

mean_cn: v. 跑步；逃跑；(价格)为；运营（公司等）n.跑步；（做某事或为获胜而做的）尝试；（某产品一次性生产出的）数量
sentence: I run two miles to work every day, then shower and change my clothes.
sentence_tra: 我每天跑两英里去上班，然后洗澡，换衣服。

mean_cn: adj.文学的，文学上的；精通文学的；以写作为职业的；书本上的；书面语的
sentence: Her awesome literary knowledge was a matter of pride for her parents.
sentence_tra: 她丰富的文学学识是她父母的骄傲。

mean_cn: adj.额外的adv.非常，特别地n.附加物；[影视]临时演员
sentence: Do you think I could type faster with an extra finger?
After we celebrate our graduation from university, I guess the hard work really begins.

mean_cn: n. 标题;  头衔;  权利;  adj. 标题的, 题目的;  称呼的;  vt. 加标题于;  授予…称号;
sentence: I knew what the story was about by reading the title.
sentence_tra: 我看标题就知道这本书讲的是什么。

mean_cn: vi. 显出钟爱之情;  adj. 喜爱的;  溺爱的;  精神错乱的;

sentence_tra: 我喜欢跟我的猛男男友有身体接触。

sentence: The family had an enjoyable afternoon together.
sentence_tra: 这家人度过了一个愉快的下午。

sentence: I delivered a speech to the assembly of union members.
sentence_tra: 我在工会会员大会上做了演讲。

sentence: Shakespeare is supposed to be the greatest poet of all time.
sentence_tra: 莎士比亚被认为是史上最伟大的诗人。

mean_cn: adj.在前的，以前的 n.前者

mean_cn: n.仁慈，亲切；好意；友好行为

mean_cn: n.平均；平均水平adj.通常的；平均的v.平均为

sentence: Smart phones are a very recent development.
sentence_tra: 智能手机是近两年才发展起来的。

mean_cn: vi. 捐献, 捐赠;  vt. 捐献, 捐赠;
sentence: I donate blood to help those who need it.
sentence_tra: 我献血给需要的人们。

mean_cn: n. 大学毕业生, 学位获得者;  vi. 毕业;  渐变, 渐渐变为;  取得资格;  adj. 毕业的;  研究生的;  vt. 授予…学位;

mean_cn: n. 交易;  交换;  交易所;  兑换;  vi. 交换, 替换, 进行易货贸易;  vt. 交换, 互换;  交流;
